title: Client Services
description:
**Position Overview:**

We are looking for a proactive and customer-focused Client Servicing Executive to serve as the primary point of contact for our clients. The ideal candidate will be responsible for understanding client needs, managing their accounts, and providing personalized support to ensure their success. This role requires excellent communication skills, strong attention to detail, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.

**Responsibilities:**

* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, acting as their trusted advisor and advocate within the company
* Serve as the main point of contact for client inquiries, requests, and concerns, and ensure timely resolution of issues
* Conduct regular check-ins with clients to assess their satisfaction, gather feedback, and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling
* Collaborate with internal teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to address client needs and deliver solutions that align with their goals
* Coordinate and oversee the onboarding process for new clients, ensuring a smooth transition and successful implementation of our products/services
* Provide ongoing support and guidance to clients, including training sessions, troubleshooting assistance, and product demonstrations
* Monitor client accounts and performance metrics, identify areas for improvement, and proactively recommend solutions to drive value and maximize retention
* Prepare and deliver regular reports and updates to clients, summarizing key activities, outcomes, and recommendations
* Stay informed about industry trends, competitive landscape, and best practices in client servicing to maintain a competitive edge

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
* Proven experience in client servicing, account management, or customer success roles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients
* Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a focus on delivering results and exceeding client expectations
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot)
* Detail-oriented mindset and organizational skills, with a commitment to accuracy and quality
* Positive attitude, proactive mindset, and willingness to go above and beyond to ensure client satisfaction

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* 2 years Experience in Client Servicing
* Knowledge of client relationship specially in advertising
* Familiarity with project management methodologies and tools
* Understanding of data analysis and reporting techniques

**About us**

At Sonar Conectar, we offer a dynamic work environment where you'll have the chance to shape memorable experiences for our clients and make a lasting impact in the event management industry. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to elevate your career and be part of something truly special! Apply now and let's create magic together. Check out the job description below.

**Job Description:**

The Client Services Manager will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with our existing clients, ensuring their needs are met and expectations exceeded.

· Develop and nurture relationships with existing clients, serving as their primary point of contact for all event-related inquiries and requests.

· Manage existing client accounts, proactively engaging with clients to understand their event objectives, preferences, and feedback, ensuring prime delivery.

· Collaborate with internal teams (Production and Creative teams) to translate client visions into successful events.

· Regularly interact with clients through telephone calls, email communications, or face-to-face meetings.

· Respond to client inquiries in a timely and professional manner.

· Stay informed about industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to identify new business opportunities.

· Prepare regular reports and presentations for senior management, highlighting achievements, challenges, and opportunities.

· Manage all pre- and post-event operations and pre-post P&L’s to ensure outstanding and unforgettable events are delivered.

**Major Skills:**

· Leadership Skills.

· Excellent presentation skills.

· Excellent communication, both written and verbal.

· The ability to work efficiently under pressure.

· Team collaboration.

title: Account Executive
description:
We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented individual to join our team as an Accounts Executive. You will be responsible for assisting with various accounting tasks and financial activities within our organization. This position offers an excellent opportunity for recent graduates or individuals with limited experience in the field of accounting to gain valuable hands-on experience and grow within the company.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Recording financial transactions accurately in accounting software and maintaining financial records.

2. Processing accounts payable and accounts receivable transactions.

3. Reconciling inventory vs sales and receipts

4. Reconciling bank / card statements and accounts to ensure accuracy and completeness.

5. Assisting with payroll processing and related statutory compliance.

6. Supporting the preparation of GST, TDS payments / returns and ensuring compliance with tax regulations.

7. Participating in internal audits and providing necessary documentation and support.

8. Assisting with month-end and year-end closing processes.

9. Providing administrative support as needed.

10. Assisting in the preparation of financial statements, reports, and budgets.

11. Staying updated on accounting principles, regulations, and best practices.

Requirements:

1. Bachelor's or Masters degree in Accounting, Finance field.

2. Strong analytical and mathematical skills.

3. Proficiency in MS Excel and accounting software (e.g., Tally).

4. Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.

5. Strong organizational and time management skills.

6. Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

7. Good communication and interpersonal skills.

8. Knowledge of Indian accounting standards and statutory regulations is preferred.

9. Prior internship or work experience in accounting or finance is a plus.

This is an entry-level position with opportunities for growth and advancement within the organization. We offer competitive compensation and benefits, along with a supportive work environment where you can develop your skills and build a rewarding career in accounting. If you are eager to learn and passionate about pursuing a career in finance, we encourage you to apply.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
***Senior Manager - Customer Success*** 

***Hungry, Honest, Humble, with Heart!***  

  



**The Opportunity**  

  

*This role is hybrid*  

  



Nutanix is building a world class Customer Success and Renewals organization and we are looking for a Senior Manager of Customer Success who will be instrumental in coaching and managing our growing regional team based in India. The ideal candidate is passionate about serving customers and has a proven track-record of leading high-performance, metrics driven teams. Key to success in this role is a strong ability to work with other stakeholders internally and externally to support the best outcomes for Nutanix and our customers.


Sound like you? Read on!
 

**Responsibilities**

* Lead and coach the regional Customer Success team by providing the vision and direction to ensure we exceed key performance metrics and annual goals including customer check in’s, renewal rates and renewal bookings
* Attract, retain, and recruit a high-performing Customer Success team across all target customers within India
* Own and operate the forecasting cadence across the team, including managing team forecasts, mentoring team members, offering executive support with customers, and managing escalations
* Constructively operate as part of a wider, cross-functional team to ensure the success of every customer and the overall growth of Nutanix
* Partner with Sales teams to continue to refine segmentation of the customer base, resource allocation, and adoption/expansion strategies in accounts
* Meticulously manage time allowing you to achieve internal commitments and exceed customer expectations

**About you**

* 5-7 years Leadership experience in customer success, renewals or account management roles supporting India
* 5+ years of direct experience in customer facing direct quota carrying roles.
* History of accurate forecasting, driving operational excellence and business reporting
* Excellent people management skills; high empathy and consideration for team morale and individual career progression
* Proven proficiency in running metrics-driven and process-oriented teams
* Experience partnering cross functionally with Sales and Customer Support
* Strong organizational, communication, and time management skills
* Ability to operate in a fast-paced team, with energy and drive
* Excellent written, verbal, presentation, and interpersonal communication skills
* Fluent in English

**About Your Team**  

**Meet Natalie Chrara (Director of Customer Success – APJ)**  

**https://www.linkedin.com/in/natalie-chrara-9ab6412b/**Natalie joined Nutanix in 2022 as Director customer success for the APJ region. Previous experience at Salesforce, Sage and Oracle and a strong goal-oriented sales background, with direct sales management and customer success experience running teams and organizations of all sizes. When it comes to candidates, I look for people who are self-navigators with positive attitude and result driven.
